name: Moto Bike Escape Police City
description:
Moto Bike Escape Police City is a moto bike racing game with multiple moto riders in which you can be a stunt driver. Its time to show your true extreme bike driving skills by boosting your speedy skills on the tricky roads of the city. This traffic bike simulator is one of the top police games where you can press nitro to drive your bike very fast on the highway.
Features:
- Amazing environments with top racing rivals
- Easy and realistic bike controls
- Cool player animations
- Many stunts and ramps to jump from
- Attractive game graphics
- Super cool sports bike to choose from
